name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
shortDescription: Health insurance scheme providing coverage up to ₹5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
coverage: All secondary and tertiary hospitalizations with coverage up to ₹5 lakhs per family per year
eligibility: Families identified based on deprivation and occupational criteria from SECC 2011 database
All families included in the RSBY program
No restriction on family size, age, or pre-existing conditions
benefits: Cashless and paperless access to services at empaneled hospitals
Coverage for pre and post-hospitalization expenses
No restriction on family size or age
Coverage for 3 days pre-hospitalization and 15 days post-hospitalization expenses
Transportation allowance for specific cases
applicationProcess: Check eligibility through PM-JAY portal or mobile app
Visit nearest empaneled hospital with appropriate ID proof
Get verified through biometric authentication
Receive e-card for availing benefits

hindi.name: प्रधानमंत्री जन आरोग्य योजना
hindi.shortDescription: प्रति परिवार प्रति वर्ष ₹5 लाख तक का स्वास्थ्य बीमा कवरेज प्रदान करने वाली योजना।

tamil.name: பிரதமர் ஜன் ஆரோக்யா திட்டம்
tamil.shortDescription: குடும்பத்திற்கு ஆண்டுக்கு ₹5 லட்சம் வரை மருத்துவக் காப்பீடு வழங்கும் திட்டம்.

gujarati.name: પ્રધાનમંત્રી જન આરોગ્ય યોજના
gujarati.shortDescription: દર વર્ષે પરિવાર દીઠ ₹5 લાખ સુધીનું આરોગ્ય વીમા કવરેજ પ્રદાન કરતી યોજના.

name: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram (JSSK)
shortDescription: Initiative to provide completely free and cashless services to pregnant women and sick newborns in government health institutions.
coverage: All pregnant women and newborns (up to 30 days after birth) are eligible for free services at government health institutions
eligibility: All sick newborns (up to 30 days after birth)
benefits: Free delivery services including cesarean section
Free drugs and consumables
Free diagnostics and blood transfusion if required
Free diet during stay at the health institutions
Free transport between home and health institutions
Free transport between facilities in case of referral
Exemption from all user charges
applicationProcess: Visit nearest government healthcare facility
No formal application required - services provided to all pregnant women and newborns
Present any government ID for registration purposes

hindi.name: जननी शिशु सुरक्षा कार्यक्रम
hindi.shortDescription: सरकारी स्वास्थ्य संस्थानों में गर्भवती महिलाओं और बीमार नवजात शिशुओं को पूरी तरह से मुफ्त और नकदी रहित सेवाएं प्रदान करने की पहल।

tamil.name: ஜனனி சிசு சுரக்ஷா காரியக்ரம்
tamil.shortDescription: அரசு மருத்துவமனைகளில் கர்ப்பிணிப் பெண்களுக்கும் நோயுற்ற குழந்தைகளுக்கும் முற்றிலும் இலவச சேவைகளை வழங்கும் திட்டம்.

name: Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK)
shortDescription: Child health screening and early intervention program for children from birth to 18 years to detect and manage 4Ds - Defects, Deficiencies, Diseases, and Developmental delays.
coverage: All children from birth to 18 years of age for early detection and treatment of selected health conditions
eligibility: All children from birth to 18 years of age
Priority to children in anganwadis and government/government-aided schools
benefits: Free health screening for birth defects, diseases, deficiencies, and developmental delays
Free treatment including surgeries at tertiary level
Follow-up treatment and management
Child health screening record cards
Referral support and treatment
applicationProcess: No formal application required
Mobile health teams visit anganwadis and schools
Children identified with health conditions are referred to appropriate health facilities

hindi.name: राष्ट्रीय बाल स्वास्थ्य कार्यक्रम
hindi.shortDescription: जन्म से 18 वर्ष तक के बच्चों के लिए स्वास्थ्य जांच और जल्दी हस्तक्षेप कार्यक्रम, जिससे 4Ds - विकार, कमियां, बीमारियां और विकासात्मक देरी का पता लगाया जा सके।

gujarati.name: રાષ્ટ્રીય બાળ સ્વાસ્થ્ય કાર્યક્રમ
gujarati.shortDescription: જન્મથી 18 વર્ષ સુધીના બાળકો માટે આરોગ્ય તપાસ અને વહેલી દખલ કાર્યક્રમ, જેથી 4Ds - ખામીઓ, ઉણપો, રોગો અને વિકાસમાં વિલંબનું નિદાન અને સંચાલન કરી શકાય.

name: National Health Protection Scheme (NHPS)
shortDescription: Comprehensive health insurance scheme providing coverage up to ₹5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
coverage: Comprehensive coverage for hospitalization expenses with coverage up to ₹5 lakhs per family per year
eligibility: All citizens with priority to economically weaker sections
No restriction on family size, age, or pre-existing conditions
benefits: Cashless and paperless access to services at empaneled hospitals
Coverage for pre and post-hospitalization expenses
No restriction on family size or age
Coverage for 3 days pre-hospitalization and 15 days post-hospitalization expenses
Transportation allowance
applicationProcess: Register through the official portal
Submit required documentation for verification
Receive health card for availing benefits
Use the card at any empaneled hospital for cashless treatment

hindi.name: राष्ट्रीय स्वास्थ्य सुरक्षा योजना
hindi.shortDescription: व्यापक स्वास्थ्य बीमा योजना जो प्रति परिवार प्रति वर्ष ₹5 लाख तक का कवरेज प्रदान करती है।

tamil.name: தேசிய சுகாதார பாதுகாப்பு திட்டம்
tamil.shortDescription: ஆண்டுக்கு ₹5 லட்சம் வரை விரிவான மருத்துவ காப்பீடு வழங்கும் திட்டம்.

kannada.name: ರಾಷ್ಟ್ರೀಯ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ರಕ್ಷಣೆ ಯೋಜನೆ
kannada.shortDescription: ಕುಟುಂಬಕ್ಕೆ ವರ್ಷಕ್ಕೆ ₹5 ಲಕ್ಷದವರೆಗೆ ಸಮಗ್ರ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ವಿಮೆ ಒದಗಿಸುವ ಯೋಜನೆ.

name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
shortDescription: Accident insurance scheme offering coverage for accidental death and disability for a premium of just ₹12 per year.
coverage: Coverage for accidental death and disability with a sum insured of ₹2 lakhs for accidental death
eligibility: All Indian citizens between 18-70 years of age
Should be willing to enroll and authorize auto-debit
benefits: ₹2 lakhs for accidental death
₹2 lakhs for total and irrecoverable loss of both eyes or loss of use of both hands or feet
₹1 lakh for total and irrecoverable loss of one eye or loss of use of one hand or foot
Annual premium of just ₹12
applicationProcess: Fill up the enrollment form at any bank branch or through online banking
Authorize auto-debit of premium from bank account
Receive confirmation of enrollment

hindi.name: प्रधानमंत्री सुरक्षा बीमा योजना
hindi.shortDescription: केवल ₹12 प्रति वर्ष के प्रीमियम पर दुर्घटना मृत्यु और विकलांगता के लिए कवरेज प्रदान करने वाली दुर्घटना बीमा योजना।

gujarati.name: પ્રધાનમંત્રી સુરક્ષા બીમા યોજના
gujarati.shortDescription: માત્ર ₹12 વાર્ષિક પ્રીમિયમ પર અકસ્માત મૃત્યુ અને વિકલાંગતા માટે કવરેજ આપતી યોજના.

name: Ayushman Bharat Health and Wellness Centres
shortDescription: Comprehensive primary healthcare centers providing free essential drugs, diagnostic services, and universal health coverage with focus on wellness.
coverage: Comprehensive primary healthcare including maternal and child health services, non-communicable diseases, and basic ENT care
eligibility: All citizens can access services at Health and Wellness Centres
Special focus on rural and underprivileged areas
benefits: Free essential drugs and diagnostic services
Maternal and child health services
Screening and management of non-communicable diseases
Basic ENT care, oral health, and geriatric care
Mental health services
First aid and emergency care
applicationProcess: No formal application required
Visit the nearest Health and Wellness Centre
Register with basic ID proof for follow-up services

hindi.name: आयुष्मान भारत स्वास्थ्य और कल्याण केंद्र
hindi.shortDescription: व्यापक प्राथमिक स्वास्थ्य देखभाल केंद्र जो मुफ्त आवश्यक दवाएं, नैदानिक सेवाएं और सार्वभौमिक स्वास्थ्य कवरेज प्रदान करते हैं।

kannada.name: ಆಯುಷ್ಮಾನ್ ಭಾರತ್ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ಮತ್ತು ಯೋಗಕ್ಷೇಮ ಕೇಂದ್ರಗಳು
kannada.shortDescription: ಉಚಿತ ಔಷಧಿಗಳು, ರೋಗನಿರ್ಣಯ ಸೇವೆಗಳು ಮತ್ತು ಸಾರ್ವತ್ರಿಕ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ರಕ್ಷಣೆಯನ್ನು ಒದಗಿಸುವ ಸಮಗ್ರ ಪ್ರಾಥಮಿಕ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ ಕೇಂದ್ರಗಳು.
